page.title: 19Local News for 4thJuly 1985
page.content: {Here}are some stories we have read in our local newspapers. A tractor driver lost an eye in a farm accident 7yrs. ago and has now been awarded Â£13000. A tyre he was changing blew up in his face.His son, goes to our school. {Fewer}children were injured in road accidents in Wiltshire.In the first four months of this year 24 children(15 from the Swindon area) were injured in road accidents compared with 39 for the same time last year. {A lady}and a nine year old girl were walking along a footpath near Aveburywhen cows came along and trampled on them.Mrs.Katrina Hodkin who lives at the Old Toll House was taking a short cut with her son Alexander and a dog on a lead.Suddenly
